entities.name: character
entities.description: A person appearing in the sitcom, e.g., Jerry, Elaine, George, Kramer.

entities.name: clothing
entities.description: Items of clothing that characters wear, e.g., puffy shirt, suede jacket.

entities.name: food
entities.description: Food items that characters consume, e.g., cereal, black and white cookie, soup.

entities.name: object
entities.description: An inanimate item that may be used or interacted with by characters, e.g., a couch, a car, a coffee table.

relations.name: wears
relations.description: Indicates that a character is wearing a particular item of clothing.

relations.name: friends with
relations.description: Denotes a friendly relationship between characters.

relations.name: eats
relations.description: Describes a character consuming a specific food item.

relations.name: interacts with
relations.description: Describes a scenario in which one character engages with another character or an object, whether through conversation, use, or conflict.

patterns.head: character
patterns.description: A character wearing a specific item of clothing, e.g., Jerry wears the puffy shirt.

patterns.head: character
patterns.description: One character is friends with another, e.g., Jerry is friends with George.

patterns.head: character
patterns.description: A character eating a specific food item, e.g., Kramer eats a black and white cookie.

patterns.head: character
patterns.description: A character interacting with an object, e.g., Elaine interacts with the coffee table.
